songs.title: Pole Code
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus: Swae Lee]
My bitch in the Lamb', she flyin' first class
Designs on her bag, with designs on her ass
She follow the code, she don't fuck with hoes
She outta control, she fuck with the pole
She fuck with the pole, with the pole
She fuck with the pole
She fuck with the pole, with the pole
She fuck with the pole
She fuck with the pole, she follow the code
She follow the code, she fuck with the pole

[Verse 1: Swae Lee]
Got a chick on the plane, she uno class: top notch
A flight was arranged, I need that ass, let me see it
I got bands, she got bands (she got grass)
And all her tags, say "Made in France" (Paris)
She touch down
I could've swore she's from the islands with that long hair
She blow that check on all designer and she don't care, nope
If them shoes ain't Red Bottoms then she won't wear (Rojo)
No you hoes won't compare

[Refrain: Swae Lee]
Damn, I respect you get money with me
Sexy with a bankroll, that's a perfect combination
Girl on girl action, dirty dancin' is a passion
She fuckin' with that pole but she not fuckin' with you ratchets

[Chorus: Swae Lee]
My bitch in the Lamb', she flyin' first class
Designs on her bag, with designs on her ass
She follow the code, she don't fuck with hoes
She outta control, she fuck with the pole
She fuck with the pole, with the pole
She fuck with the pole
She fuck with the pole, with the pole
She fuck with the pole
She fuck with the pole, she follow the code
She follow the code, she fuck with the pole

[Verse 2: Slim Jxmmi]
Flew my bitch in on a jet
Then I took her to the mall, let her shut that bitch down
All these other hoes just be actin' messy
Let her tell it, she don't need 'em
All these bitches actin' jealous
Man she move her body like a belly dancer, rollin'
She hop up on that pole, do acrobatics, yeah
She said, "Nigga throw that money, why you playin'?" Who?
I said, "Baby bust it open for Big Franklin"
Bust it!

[Refrain: Slim Jxmmi]
I respect you get money with me
Sexy with a bankroll, that's a perfect combination
Girl on girl action, dirty dancin' is a passion
She fuckin' with that pole but she not fuckin' with you ratchets

[Chorus: Swae Lee]
My bitch in the Lamb', she flyin' first class
Designs on her bag, with designs on her ass
She follow the code, she don't fuck with hoes
She outta control, she fuck with the pole
She fuck with the pole, with the pole
She fuck with the pole
She fuck with the pole, with the pole
She fuck with the pole
She fuck with the pole, she follow the code
She follow the code, she fuck with the pole

[Outro: Swae Lee]
She fuck with the pole
She fuck with the pole
She fuck with the pole
She follow the code, she fuck with the pole
She fuck with the pole
She fuck with the pole
She fuck with the pole
She follow the code, she fuck with the pole
